title: [Whistler's Pass, Grassy Field]
description: Stray clumps of green grass struggle up from the rocky soil, overcoming the incredible odds presented by the bitterly cold and thin air.  Patches of moss stretch to consume the surface of several nearby rocks illuminated by moonlight.  To the northeast the trail begins a slow wind down the mountain.
